languages.text: "Ты, хромой, — на кухню. Все равно больше не пригодишься нигде".
"You, limper: into the kitchen you go. You're of no use anywhere else anyway."
languages.original_text: "Ты, хромой, — на кухню. Все равно больше не пригодишься нигде".

traits.locale_text: "You, limper. Into the kitchen you go. You won't be of any use anywhere else anyway."
"You, limper. Into the kitchen you go. You won't be of any use anywhere else anyway."
"You, limper: into the kitchen you go. You're of no use anywhere else anyway."
"You, limper: into the kitchen you go. You're of no use anywhere else anyway."
"You, limper: into the kitchen you go. You're of no use anywhere else anyway."
"You, limper: into the kitchen you go. You're of no use anywhere else anyway."
"You, limper: into the kitchen you go. You're of no use anywhere else anyway."
"You, limper: into the kitchen you go. You're of no use anywhere else anyway."

languages.text: « Toi, l'estropié, file en cuisine. C'est pas comme si tu pouvais être utile ailleurs, de toute façon. »
languages.original_text: "You, limper: into the kitchen you go. You're of no use anywhere else anyway."

traits.locale_text: « Toi, l'estropié, file en cuisine. C'est pas comme si tu pouvais être utile ailleurs, de toute façon. »

languages.text: «Tú, el cojo. A la cocina. En otra parte no vas a servir de gran cosa».
languages.original_text: "You, limper: into the kitchen you go. You're of no use anywhere else anyway."

traits.locale_text: «Tú, el cojo. A la cocina. En otra parte no vas a servir de gran cosa».

languages.text: 「体の不自由なそこのお前。お前は厨房に行け。どうせ他では役に立たないだろう」
languages.original_text: "You, limper: into the kitchen you go. You're of no use anywhere else anyway."

traits.locale_text: 「体の不自由なそこのお前。お前は厨房に行け。どうせ他では役に立たないだろう」

languages.text: “说你呢，瘸子，滚到厨房里去，反正你在别地方也派不上用场。”
languages.original_text: "You, limper: into the kitchen you go. You're of no use anywhere else anyway."

traits.locale_text: “说你呢，瘸子，滚到厨房里去，反正你在别地方也派不上用场。”

languages.text: Ihr Humpler da! Ab in die Küche! Woanders seid Ihr ohnehin nicht von Nutzen."
languages.original_text: "You, limper: into the kitchen you go. You're of no use anywhere else anyway."

traits.locale_text: Ihr Humpler da! Ab in die Küche! Woanders seid Ihr ohnehin nicht von Nutzen."
